mapper.sql: id, user_id, item_price, amount, order_price, create_time, status, item_id, payment_method
mapper.select:
select
from order_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status != 3 order by create_time DESC limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} , 3

select count(*)
from order_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status!=3

select
from order_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status != 3 and item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by create_time DESC limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} , 3

select
from order_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status != 3 order by create_time DESC limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} , 3

select
from order_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by create_time DESC limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} , 3

mapper.update:
update order_info
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_price = #{itemPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payment_method = #{paymentMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update order_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_price = #{itemPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment_method = #{paymentMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
